title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for one correct identification.

Two points are earned for two correct identifications.
descriptions: The response does not correctly identify any of the following culture traits that are indicative of ethnicity.
The answer correctly identifies ONE of the following culture traits indicative of ethnicity.
The answer correctly identifies TWO of the following culture traits indicative of ethnicity.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct description.
descriptions: The response does not correctly describe relocation diffusion using one of the following.
The response correctly describes relocation diffusion by using one of the following.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct description.
descriptions: The response does not correctly describe one of the following ways in which relocation diffusion resulted in the cultural landscapes shown in both photographs.
The response correctly describes one of the following ways in which relocation diffusion resulted in the cultural landscapes shown in both photographs.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct explanation.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain how the cultural landscapes represent more than one culture by using one of the following.
The response correctly explains how the cultural landscapes represent more than one culture by using one of the following.

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct explanation.
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain one of the following ways that attitudes toward people of Chinese ethnicity shaped the cultural landscapes shown in the photographs.
The response correctly explains one of the following ways that attitudes toward people of Chinese ethnicity shaped the cultural landscapes shown in the photographs.
